name: The Farmer (4fun jam)
description:
This game has been created for the 4fun jam. 

You are a hobbyist farmer, and you want to grow up carrots in your home garden.

In game you have a limited amount of time to harvest as many carrots as possible.

You have to use tools in the right sequence on the terrain to have success.

use WASD keys to move, Q to pick and E to drop a tool, Space to use it on the terrain.

This game works with Java

if you download the smaller zip you must have java,

if you download the  bigger one  it runs as stand alone
